definition: The field of study and application that involves the use of computers, telecommunications, and related technologies to process, store, transmit, and retrieve information. It encompasses various aspects of technology and systems used for managing and manipulating data, often in the context of computer networks and information systems. This term is commonly used to refer to the discipline and industry associated with the development, implementation, and maintenance of computer-based information systems and technologies.

examples.german: Die Informationstechnik hat sich in den letzten Jahren stark entwickelt.
examples.english: Information technology has developed strongly in recent years.

examples.german: Die Informationstechnik umfasst die Verarbeitung und Übertragung von Daten.
examples.english: Information technology encompasses the processing and transmission of data.

examples.german: Die Informationstechnik spielt eine wichtige Rolle in der modernen Gesellschaft.
examples.english: Information technology plays an important role in modern society.

examples.german: Die Informationstechnik ermöglicht effizientes Arbeiten und Kommunizieren.
examples.english: Information technology enables efficient work and communication.
